title: Pset_ActionRequest
description: An action request is a request for an action to fulfill a need.  HISTORY: IFC4: Removed RequestSourceType, RequestDescription, Status

RequestSourceLabel.title: RequestSourceLabel
RequestSourceLabel.description: A specific name or label that further qualifies the identity of a request source. In the event of an email, this may be the email address.

RequestSourceName.title: RequestSourceName
RequestSourceName.description: The person making the request, where known.

RequestComments.title: RequestComments
RequestComments.description: Comments that may be made on the request.
